mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Seller_User (url, telephone, shopName, nickname, description, major, password, email) VALUE (#{url}, #{telephone}, #{shopName}, #{nickname}, #{description}, #{major}, #{password},#{email})
INSERT INTO Product (pName, price, description, portraitURL, sID, num ,isDelete) VALUE (#{pName}, #{price}, #{description}, #{portraitURL}, #{sID}, #{num} ,0)
mapper.update: UPDATE Seller_User SET url=#{url}, telephone=#{telephone}, shopName = #{shopName}, nickname = #{nickname}, description = #{description}, major=#{major} ,email=#{email} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Product WHERE sID=#{0} AND isDelete=0
SELECT * FROM (OrderForm LEFT JOIN Product ON OrderForm.pID=Product.pID) LEFT JOIN CUser ON OrderForm.cID=CUser.userID WHERE sID=#{0} AND isFinish!=4
mapper.update: UPDATE OrderForm SET isFinish=0 WHERE orderID=#{orderId}
UPDATE OrderForm SET isFinish=3 WHERE orderID=#{orderId}
UPDATE Product SET pName=#{pName}, description=#{description}, price = #{price}, portraitURL = #{portraitURL}, sID = #{sID}, num=#{num} WHERE pID=#{pID}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM OrderForm LEFT JOIN Product ON Product.pID=OrderForm.pID WHERE sID=#{id}
UPDATE Product SET isDelete=1 WHERE pID=#{pid}
mapper.update: UPDATE OrderForm SET company=#{com},logistics_point=#{point} WHERE orderID=#{id}

mapper.select: SELECT Comment.orderID, Comment.createTime, Comment.message, OrderForm.cID, CUser.nickname, Product.sID, CUser.portraitURL, commented FROM Comment LEFT JOIN OrderForm ON Comment.orderID=OrderForm.orderID LEFT JOIN CUser ON OrderForm.cID=CUser.userID LEFT JOIN Product ON Product.pID=OrderForm.pID WHERE OrderForm.pID=#{0}
